xml.spreadsheet.style

Class Font

  • java.lang.Object
    • xml.spreadsheet.style.Font

  • public class Font
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the font attributes to use in this style. Each attribute that is specified is considered an override from the default.
    See Also:
    MSDN Font element reference

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • setBold

        public void setBold(boolean bold)
        Parameters:
        bold - Specifies the bold state of the font. If the parent style has Bold="1" and the child style wants to override the setting, it must explicitly set the value to Bold="0"

      • setColor

        public void setColor(java.lang.String color)
        Parameters:
        color - Specifies the color of the font. This value can be either a 6-hexadecimal digit number in "#rrggbb" format among other things

      • setFontName

        public void setFontName(java.lang.String fontName)
        Parameters:
        fontName - Specifies the name of the font. This string is case insensitive.

      • setItalic

        public void setItalic(boolean italic)
        Parameters:
        italic - Specifies the italic state of the font

      • setOutline

        public void setOutline(boolean outline)
        Parameters:
        outline - Specifies whether the font is rendered as an outline. This property originates in Macintosh Office, and is not used on Windows.

      • setShadow

        public void setShadow(boolean shadow)
        Parameters:
        shadow - Specifies whether the font is shadowed. This property originates in Macintosh Office, and is not used on Windows

      • setSize

        public void setSize(double size)
        Parameters:
        size - Specifies the size of the font in points. This value must be strictly greater than 0.

      • setStrikeThrough

        public void setStrikeThrough(boolean strikeThrough)
        Parameters:
        strikeThrough - Specifies the strike-through state of the font.

      • setUnderline

        public void setUnderline(Font.Underline underline)
        Parameters:
        underline - Specifies the underline state of the font.

      • setVerticalAlign

        public void setVerticalAlign(Font.VerticalAlignment verticalAlign)
        Parameters:
        verticalAlign - This attribute specifies the subscript or superscript state of the font.

      • setCharSet

        public void setCharSet(long charSet)
        Parameters:
        charSet - Win32-dependent character set value.

      • setFamily

        public void setFamily(Font.FontFamily family)
        Parameters:
        family - Win32-dependent font family.
